Package ohos.tools

Class ByTrace

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.tools.ByTrace

  • public final class ByTrace
extends Object
    Provides interfaces to generate ByTrace logs.

    This class traces the start, end, and value changes of key processes that last for at least 3 ms.

    Example: To trace a name verification that is expected to complete within 5 ms: 

    
 ByTrace.startTrace("checkName", "5");
 Bytrace.finishTrace("checkName");
    To trace the number of layers, which is 3: 
    
 Bytrace.count("curLayer", 3);

    Each startTrace matches one finishTrace, and they must have the same value.

    Since:
    1

    • Method Detail

      • updateTraceLabel

        public static void updateTraceLabel​()
        Updates the trace label when your process has started.

      • startTrace

        public static void startTrace​(String value,
                              float limit)
        Records a trace with the expected completion time and marks it as the start of a task. This method is invoked at the start of a transaction to indicate that a task whose name is specified by value has started. The finishTrace(java.lang.String) method using the same value must be invoked at the end of the transaction.
        Parameters:
        value - Indicates the operation name.
        limit - Indicates the expected time required for completing the operation, in milliseconds.
        Since:
        1

      • startTrace

        public static void startTrace​(String value)
        Records a trace and marks it as the start of a task. This method is invoked at the start of a transaction to indicate that a task whose name is specified by value has started. The finishTrace(java.lang.String) method using the same value must be invoked at the end of the transaction.
        Parameters:
        value - Indicates the operation name.
        Since:
        1

      • finishTrace

        public static void finishTrace​(String value)
        Records a trace and marks it as the end of a task. This method is invoked at the end of a transaction to indicate that a task whose name is specified by value has ended. This method must be invoked after the startTrace(java.lang.String,float) or startTrace(java.lang.String) method is invoked.
        Parameters:
        value - Indicates the operation name. It must be the same as the value of startTrace(java.lang.String,float) or startTrace(java.lang.String).
        Since:
        1

      • countTrace

        public static void countTrace​(String name,
                              int count)
        Records a trace for generating a count, such as clock pulse and the number of layers.
        Parameters:
        name - Indicates the operation name.
        count - Indicates the count of the operation.
        Since:
        1
